## Discussion

Use this property to create visual effects that show streaks of motion, such as fireworks. If the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/orientationMode] property value is [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleOrientationMode/free], a non-default stretch factor stretches particle images in the y-axis direction of each particle’s local coordinate space.

The default value is `0.0`, specifying that particle images maintain their original aspect ratio.

You can animate changes to this property’s value. See [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/animating-scenekit-content].

# stretchFactor

**Instance Property**

A multiplier for stretching particle images along their direction of motion. Animatable.

## Declaration

```swift
var stretchFactor: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to create visual effects that show streaks of motion, such as fireworks. If the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/orientationMode] property value is [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleOrientationMode/free], a non-default stretch factor stretches particle images in the y-axis direction of each particle’s local coordinate space.

The default value is `0.0`, specifying that particle images maintain their original aspect ratio.

You can animate changes to this property’s value. See [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/animating-scenekit-content].

## Specifying Particle Appearance

- **particleSize**: The rendered size, in units of the scene’s world coordinate space, of the particle image. Animatable.
- **particleSizeVariation**: The range of randomized particle sizes. Animatable.
- **particleColor**: The color of newly spawned particles. Animatable.
- **particleColorVariation**: The ranges of randomized particle color components. Animatable.
- **particleImage**: The texture image SceneKit uses to render each particle.
- **fresnelExponent**: The reflectivity exponent SceneKit uses when rendering the particle’s image as a cube map. Animatable.
